element.name: Post Apocalyptical Horse Training by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (3.5/2)

long-description.center:
The above coordinates are on private land to which you have no right of access.
Calculate the length of the track at this location to the nearest 50 metres. A
Calculate the area enclosed by the track to the nearest hectare. B

Calculate the area enclosed by the track to the nearest acre. C
How many fields border the track to the south? D

N 53째 (c+d)*2 point a/b+c*2-b+d
W 006째 c-d point a/b+c*2-d*2

element.encoded-hints: I wonder If I can fInd the rIght locatIon?

ul.li:
2010-05-08T19:00:00Z : Found it by abra123cadabra
Solved this a while back and finally went to grab it today. We tried "Feeding the swans" first but didn't dare to follow the partly flooded road. After a little detour we found the container immediately. Good hint but not needed as coords were spot on. Nice place and interesting puzzle. Thank you.

2010-03-12T20:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Took a long time to figure out the co-ords! Eventually got some numbers that looked correct and went up to the cache today - found it nice and easily.

2009-12-29T20:00:00Z : Found it by Hezekiah
Found after a lengthy puzzle solving session. Good coordinates - I beamed when I found it! TFTC!

2009-12-29T20:00:00Z : Found it by Windsockers
Solved this last night but giving the weather I decided to wait till this morning to hunt for the location.
Found easy the clue appeared before my IyI's
TfTc and the FtF

wpt.name: GC22C1M
wpt.desc: Post Apocalyptical Horse Training by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (3.5/2)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Post Apocalyptical Horse Training
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The above coordinates are on private land to which you have no right of access.
Calculate the length of the track at this location to the nearest 50 metres. A
Calculate the area enclosed by the track to the nearest hectare. B
Calculate the area enclosed by the track to the nearest acre. C
How many fields border the track to the south? D
 
The final location is:
N 53째 (c+d)*2 point a/b+c*2-b+d
W 006째 c-d point a/b+c*2-d*2
 
 

Additional Waypoints
